conversation.content: Hello! Let’s compare two apartments. Tell me about the first one. Where is it?
The first apartment is in downtown. It have two bedrooms.
Great! And where is the second apartment? How many bedrooms does it have?
The second apartment is in the suburbs. It has three bedrooms.
Nice! So, the downtown apartment has two bedrooms, and the suburban one has three. Which area do you like more, downtown or the suburbs?

Got it! So, you prefer the downtown apartment because of its location, even though it has fewer bedrooms than the suburban one. Location can be very important! Thanks for practicing with me—great job comparing the two!
Thank you! It was fun to practice.
